ai-pli-tv-kd20:16.1.1_0: On one occasion the monks had an abundance of dwellings, but the nuns were lacking.

ai-pli-tv-kd20:16.2.5_0: If she does, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:16.2.6_0: I allow a monastery robe for the monastery.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:16.2.7_0: The monastery robe became stained with blood.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:16.2.12_0: “I allow you to tie it onto the ropes of a string.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:16.2.15_0: “I allow a loin cloth and a girdle.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:16.2.16_0: the nuns from the group of six were wearing a girdle all the time.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:16.2.17_0: People complained and criticized the monks,
ai-pli-tv-kd20:16.2.18_0: “They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:16.2.20_0: “A nun should not wear a girdle all the time.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:16.2.21_0: If she does, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:16.2.22_0: I allow a nun to wear a girdle while she is menstruating.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:16.2.23_0: The second recitation section is finished.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.1.1_0: At that time the full ordination had been given to people who were fully ordained,
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.1.2_0: women who lacked genitals, who had incomplete genitals, who did not menstruate, who menstruated continuously, who always wore menstruation pads, who were incontinent, who had genital prolapse, who lacked sexual organs, who were manlike, who had fistula, who were hermaphrodites.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.1.4_0: “When you are giving the full ordination, you should ask if you are any of these four things.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.1.5_0: And it should be done like this:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.1.6_0: ʻDo you lack genitals? Are your genitals incomplete? Are you without menstruation? Do you menstruate continuously? Do you always wear a menstruation pad? Are you incontinent? Do you have genital prolapse? Do you lack sexual organs? Are you manlike? Do you have fistula? Are you a hermaphrodite?
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.1.7_0: Do you have any of these diseases:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.1.8_0: leprosy, abscesses, mild leprosy, tuberculosis, or epilepsy?
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.1.9_0: Are you human? Are you a woman? Are you a free woman? Are you free from debt? Are you employed by the King?
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.1.10_0: Do you have permission from your parents and husband?
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.1.11_0: Are you twenty years old? Do you have a full set of bowl and robes? What is your name? What is the name of your mentor?”’”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.2.1_0: At that time the monks asked those nuns about the impediments.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.2.2_0: They were embarrassed, humiliated, and unable to respond.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.2.4_0: “Only when a woman who is free from impediments has been fully ordained on one side in the Sangha of nuns, should you give her the full ordination in the Sangha of monks.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.2.5_0: The nuns asked those seeking the full ordination about the impediments without first instructing them.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.2.6_0: They were embarrassed, humiliated, and unable to respond.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.2.8_0: “You should instruct them first and then ask about the obstructions.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.2.9_0: They instructed them right there in the midst of the Sangha.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.2.10_0: Once more those seeking the full ordination were embarrassed, humiliated, and unable to respond.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.2.12_0: “You should instruct them to one side and then ask about the obstructions in the midst of the Sangha.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.2.13_0: And it should be done like this.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.2.14_0: First the candidate should be told to choose a preceptor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.2.15_0: Her bowl and robes should then be pointed out to her:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.2.16_0: ʻThis is your bowl, this your outer robe, this your upper robe, this your sarong, this is your chest wrap, and this is your bathing robe.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.2.17_0: Now please go and stand over there.’”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.3.1_0: They were instructed by nuns who were ignorant and incompetent.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.3.2_0: And because they were badly instructed, they were once again embarrassed, humiliated, and unable to respond.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.3.4_0: “A nun who is ignorant and incompetent should not instruct.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.3.5_0: If she does, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.3.6_0: A nun who is competent and capable should instruct.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.1_0: They instructed without having been appointed.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.3_0: “A monk should not instruct if he hasn’t been appointed to do so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.4_0: If she does, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.5_0: A monk should instruct when he has been appointed to do so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.6_0: And it should be done like this:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.7_0: either one should be appointed through oneself or one should be appointed through another.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.8_0: And how are you approved through yourself?
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.9_0: A competent and capable nun should inform the Sangha:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.10_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.11_0: So-and-so is seeking the full ordination with Venerable so-and-so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.12_0: If it seems appropriate to the Sangha, I will instruct so-and-so.’
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.13_0: In this way one is appointed through oneself.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.14_0: And how is one appointed through another?
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.15_0: A competent and capable nun should inform the Sangha:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.16_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.17_0: So-and-so is seeking the full ordination with Venerable so-and-so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.18_0: If it seems appropriate to the Sangha, so-and-so will instruct so-and-so.’
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.4.19_0: In this way one is appointed through another.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.1_0: The appointed nun should approach the one seeking the full ordination and say this:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.3_0: Now is the time for you to tell the truth.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.4_0: When asked in the midst of the Sangha about various matters, you should say, “Yes,” if it’s true and, “No,” if it’s not.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.6_0: This is what they will ask you:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.7_0: “Do you lack genitals? Are your genitals incomplete? Are you without menstruation? Do you menstruate continuously? Do you always wear a menstruation pad? Are you incontinent? Do you have genital prolapse? Do you lack sexual organs? Are you manlike? Do you have fistula? Are you a hermaphrodite?
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.8_0: Do you have any of these diseases:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.9_0: leprosy, abscesses, mild leprosy, tuberculosis, or epilepsy?
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.10_0: Are you human? Are you a woman? Are you a free woman? Are you free from debt? Are you employed by the King?
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.11_0: Do you have permission from your parents and husband?
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.12_0: Are you twenty years old? Do you have a full set of bowl and robes? What is your name? What is the name of your mentor?”’”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.13_0: They then returned to the Sangha together.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.15_0: The Sangha should return first and inform the Sangha:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.16_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.17_0: So-and-so is seeking the full ordination with Venerable so-and-so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.18_0: She has been instructed by me.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.19_0: If it seems appropriate to the Sangha, so-and-so should come.’
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.20_0: ʻGo and come,’ he should be told to say.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.21_0: She should then put her upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the nuns, squat on her heels, and raise her joined palms. She should then ask for ordination:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.22_0: ‘Venerables, I ask the Sangha for the full ordination.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.23_0: May the Sangha lift me up out of compassion.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.24_0: For the second time, Venerables, I ask the Sangha for the full ordination.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.25_0: May the Sangha lift me up out of compassion.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.26_0: For the third time, Venerables, I ask the Sangha for the full ordination.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.5.27_0: May the Sangha lift me up out of compassion.’
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.6.1_0: A competent and capable nun should inform the Sangha:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.6.2_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.6.3_0: So-and-so is seeking the full ordination with Venerable so-and-so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.6.4_0: If it seems appropriate to the Sangha, I will ask so-and-so about the impediments.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.6.6_0: Now is the time for you to tell the truth.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.6.7_0: I will ask you about various matters. If something is true, you should say, “Yes,” and if it’s not, you should say, “No.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.6.8_0: So: Do you lack genitals? Are your genitals incomplete? Are you without menstruation? Do you menstruate continuously? Do you always wear a menstruation pad? Are you incontinent? Do you have genital prolapse? Do you lack sexual organs? Are you manlike? Do you have fistula? Are you a hermaphrodite? Do you have any of these diseases: leprosy, abscesses, mild leprosy, tuberculosis, or epilepsy? Are you human? Are you a woman? Are you a free woman? Are you free from debt? Are you employed by the King? Do you have permission from your parents and husband? Are you twenty years old? Do you have a full set of bowl and robes?
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.6.9_0: What is your name? What is the name of your mentor?’
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.1_0: A competent and capable nun should inform the Sangha:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.2_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.3_0: So-and-so is seeking the full ordination with Venerable so-and-so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.5_0: So-and-so is asking the Sangha for the full ordination with so-and-so as her mentor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.6_0: If it seems appropriate to the Sangha, the Sangha should give her the full ordination with so-and-so as her mentor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.8_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.9_0: So-and-so is seeking the full ordination with Venerable so-and-so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.11_0: So-and-so is asking the Sangha for the full ordination with so-and-so as her mentor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.12_0: The Sangha gives her the full ordination with so-and-so as her mentor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.13_0: Any nun who approves of giving the full ordination to so-and-so with so-and-so as her mentor should remain silent.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.14_0: Any nun who does not approve should speak up.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.16_0: For the third time I speak on this matter.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.17_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.18_0: So-and-so is seeking the full ordination with Venerable so-and-so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.20_0: So-and-so is asking the Sangha for the full ordination with so-and-so as her mentor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.21_0: The Sangha gives her the full ordination with so-and-so as her mentor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.22_0: Any nun who approves of giving the full ordination to so-and-so with so-and-so as her mentor should remain silent.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.23_0: Any nun who does not approve should speak up.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.24_0: The Sangha has given the full ordination to so-and-so with so-and-so as her mentor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.7.25_0: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I will remember it thus.’”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.1_0: “Straightaway she should be taken to the Sangha of monks. She should put her upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the monks, squat on her heels, and raise her joined palms. She should then ask for ordination:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.2_0: ‘Venerables, I’m seeking the full ordination with Venerable so-and-so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.3_0: I’m free from impediments and have been fully ordained on one side in the Sangha of nuns.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.4_0: I ask the Sangha for the full ordination.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.5_0: May the Sangha lift me up out of compassion.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.6_0: Venerables, I’m seeking the full ordination with Venerable so-and-so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.7_0: I’m free from impediments and have been fully ordained on one side in the Sangha of nuns.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.8_0: For the second time I ask the Sangha for the full ordination.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.9_0: May the Sangha lift me up out of compassion.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.10_0: Venerables, I’m seeking the full ordination with Venerable so-and-so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.11_0: I’m free from impediments and have been fully ordained on one side in the Sangha of nuns.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.12_0: For the third time I ask the Sangha for the full ordination.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.13_0: May the Sangha lift me up out of compassion.’
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.14_0: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.15_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.16_0: So-and-so is seeking the full ordination with Venerable so-and-so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.17_0: I’m free from impediments and have been fully ordained on one side in the Sangha of nuns.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.18_0: So-and-so is asking the Sangha for the full ordination with so-and-so as her mentor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.19_0: If it seems appropriate to the Sangha, the Sangha should give her the full ordination with so-and-so as her mentor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.21_0: Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.22_0: So-and-so is seeking the full ordination with Venerable so-and-so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.23_0: I’m free from impediments and have been fully ordained on one side in the Sangha of nuns.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.24_0: So-and-so is asking the Sangha for the full ordination with so-and-so as her mentor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.25_0: The Sangha gives her the full ordination with so-and-so as her mentor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.26_0: Any monk who approves of giving the full ordination to so-and-so with so-and-so as her mentor should remain silent.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.27_0: Any monk who doesn’t agree should speak up.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.29_0: For the third time I speak on this matter.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.30_0: Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.31_0: So-and-so is seeking the full ordination with Venerable so-and-so.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.32_0: I’m free from impediments and have been fully ordained on one side in the Sangha of nuns.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.33_0: So-and-so is asking the Sangha for the full ordination with so-and-so as her mentor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.34_0: The Sangha gives her the full ordination with so-and-so as her mentor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.35_0: Any monk who approves of giving the full ordination to so-and-so with so-and-so as her mentor should remain silent.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.36_0: Any monk who doesn’t agree should speak up.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.37_0: The Sangha has given so-and-so the full ordination with so-and-so as her mentor.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.38_0: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I will remember it thus.’”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.39_0: The nuns should be dismissed, as well as to say, “Now, I should be told to point out the seventh day.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:17.8.40_0: The nuns should be told to point out the three supports and the eight things not to be done to the newly ordained nun.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:18.1.1_0: On one occasion the right time for eating passed while the nuns were trying to find the right seats in the dining hall.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:18.1.3_0: “I allow eight nuns to be seated according to seniority, but the rest according to their time of arrival.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:18.1.6_0: eight nuns reserved places everywhere according to seniority, the rest getting places according to their time of arrival.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:18.1.8_0: “I allow eight nuns to be seated in the dining hall according to seniority and the rest according to their time of arrival,
ai-pli-tv-kd20:18.1.10_0: If a nun makes a reservation anywhere apart from the dining hall, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.1.1_0: At that time the nuns did not do the invitation procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.1.3_0: “A nun should do the invitation procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.1.4_0: If she doesn’t, she should be dealt with according to the rule.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.1.5_0: At that time the nuns did the invitation procedure among themselves, but not with the Sangha of monks.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.1.7_0: “After doing the invitation procedure among the nuns, a nun should do the invitation procedure with the monks.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.1.8_0: If she doesn’t, she should be dealt with according to the rule.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.1.9_0: At that time the monks did the invitation procedure together with the nuns. They made a racket.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.1.11_0: “The nuns should not do the invitation procedure all together.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.1.12_0: Any nun who does commits an offense of wrong conduct.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.1.13_0: On one occasion when the nuns did the invitation procedure before the meal, they did not finish until after the time for eating.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.1.15_0: “I allow the nuns to do the invitation procedure after the meal.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.1.16_0: Doing the invitation procedure after the meal, they did not finish until it was too late to eat.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.1.18_0: “I allow the nuns to do the invitation procedure among themselves on one day and with the monks on the following day.”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.2.1_0: At that time the whole Sangha of nuns did the invitation procedure. They made a racket.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.2.3_0: “I allow the nuns to appoint one capable and competent nun
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.2.4_0: to do the invitation procedure with the Sangha of monks on behalf of the Sangha of nuns.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.2.5_0: She should be appointed like this.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.2.6_0: First a nun should be asked, and then a competent and capable nun should inform the Sangha:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.2.7_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.2.8_0: If it seems appropriate to the Sangha, the Sangha should appoint nun so-and-so to do the invitation procedure with the Sangha of monks on behalf of the Sangha of nuns.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.2.10_0: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.2.11_0: The Sangha appoints nun so-and-so to do the invitation procedure with the Sangha of monks on behalf of the Sangha of nuns.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.2.12_0: Any nun who approves of appointing nun so-and-so to do the invitation procedure with the Sangha of monks on behalf of the Sangha of nuns should remain silent.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.2.13_0: Any nun who does not approve should speak up.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.2.14_0: The Sangha has appointed nun so-and-so to do the invitation procedure with the Sangha of monks on behalf of the Sangha of nuns.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.2.15_0: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I will remember it thus.’”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.3.1_0: The appointed nun should take the Sangha of nuns to the Sangha of monks. She should then put her upper robe over one shoulder, squat on her heels, raise her joined palms, and say:
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.3.2_0: ʻVenerables, the Sangha of nuns invites the Sangha of monks to correct it concerning
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.3.3_0: what has been seen, what has been heard, or what is suspected.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.3.4_0: Please correct the Sangha of nuns, Venerables, out of compassion. If the Sangha of nuns sees a fault, it will make amends.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.3.5_0: For the second time the Sangha of nuns invites the Sangha of monks to correct it concerning what you have seen, what you have heard, or what you suspect. Please correct the Sangha of nuns, Venerables, out of compassion. If the Sangha of nuns sees a fault, it will make amends.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.3.6_0: For the third time the Sangha of nuns invites the Sangha of monks to correct it concerning
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.3.7_0: what has been seen, what has been heard, or what is suspected.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:19.3.8_0: Please correct the Sangha of nuns, Venerables, out of compassion. If the Sangha of nuns sees a fault, it will make amends.’”
ai-pli-tv-kd20:20.1.1_0: At that time the nuns canceled the monks’ observance-day procedure and their invitation procedure; they spoke to them to initiate a legal process against them; they made accusations against them, asked them for permission to accuse them of offenses, accused them of offenses, and reminded them of offenses.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:20.1.3_0: “A nun should not cancel the observance-day procedure of a monk.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:20.1.4_0: If she does cancel it, it’s not actually canceled,
ai-pli-tv-kd20:20.1.5_0: and she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:20.1.6_0: He should not cancel the invitation procedure of a regular monk.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:20.1.7_0: If she does cancel it, it’s not actually canceled,
ai-pli-tv-kd20:20.1.8_0: and she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:20.1.9_0: He should not speak to a regular monk to initiate a legal process against him.
ai-pli-tv-kd20:20.1.10_0: If she does, it’s not actually done,
ai-pli-tv-kd20:20.1.11_0: and she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
